img_summary: The image depicts the "Skandha of Form," an uncommon key item in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is described as a treasure with an unrevealed secret, once hidden inside the Buddha's head. The item is found in the Forest of Wolves - Front Hills in Black Wind Mountain, specifically in a river opposite the Bullguard fight. It is used alongside other Skandha key items to create the Skandhas Pill from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge.
